name: Tatami Timing
description:
Tatami Timing is a short puzzle game where you click on tatami mats to send them off in a direction. Stop each tatami in their designated location, shaded in black. Correctly get each mat into its proper place to get the maximum amount of points.

Square Mats
You can place these anywhere on the shaded areas, they will snap automatically to the mat.

Rectangle Mats
You can right-click these to send them off in a direction. Once they collide with anything - another tatami mat or a platform - they will stop moving.

Controls

  • Hold left-click on square tatami mats in order to drag them into place.
  • Tap left-click on other tatami mats to send them off into a direction
  • Hover over a tatami to see which direction it will move in

Made by Luke Klegraefe

Music:
Japan's Dream by Eugenio Izzi
